channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2024101851
item.description:
Report X-2024101851

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-04T12:23:29+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-02
  • City: KAHULUI
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE GROUND TO HAWAII PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING. GROUND TO HAWAII PACKAGES MUST TRAVEL IN THE AIR NETWORK TO HAWAII DESTINATIONS. UPON INSPECTION THERE ARE FOUR ONE-QUART CANS OF FLAMMABLE BENJAMIN MOORE WOODLUXE OIL-BASED WATERPROOFING STAIN AND SEALER. THERE IS NO SEPARATION OR ABSORBENT MATERIALS INSIDE THE PACKAGE. THE CANS APPEAR SLIGHTLY DENTED WITH ONE OF THE QUART CANS LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.
